programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera: Top 100
programme.desc: ...Camera - Top 100. A collection of standout videos from season one, showcasing the most chilling and unexplainable paranormal activity footage captured by eyewitnesses. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: National Park Mysteries
programme.desc: Chaco Culture National Historical Park: Built by the ancient Anasazi, spooky sightings in this national park include shape-shifting creatures and time-traveling Wingmakers. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: National Park Mysteries
programme.desc: Yosemite National Park: The infamous Yosemite National Park has a darker side that includes mysterious sightings, disappearances and even a prehistoric pterodactyl. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Encounter: UFO
programme.desc: They keep coming back. There are areas around the world that seem to keep attracting UFOs, where objects return to the skies again and again, as if taunting witnesses below. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Dam Break: Dams are a marvel of engineering, but when the South Fork Dam gave way during a storm in 1889 - killing 2,200 people - the damage was catastrophic. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Glow Train: A freight train carrying roughly one million pounds of propane derails in Wisconsin, with a tanker explosion forcing the evacuation of an entire town. (S3, ep 7)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: New. Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 64)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry and Sam visit Normous Newark Autojumble and come away with a challenge. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Bronze Beauty: The auction action moves to the tiny town of Pantego, Texas, where one pair of buyers strikes gold with a curious wooden box. (S4, ep 4)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Wind Beneath My Mill: Rick eyes a giant US Navy Jack, while the team are pitched a signed photo of Cy Young, a 1930s spanker and more.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Moving Targets: Series following life in the Gold family's pawn shop. Tension mounts when a man blows his top over a mix-up with his gold chain, and an alleged cursed relic scares Ashley.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Bulletproof Gator: Series following life in the Gold family's pawn shop. The Golds clash when a man brings in an angry pet alligator he wants rid of. Will Les make a bad decision?

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind The Deal
programme.desc: Life After Death: Remember when Ashley quit the business? Seth and Les do. Look back with them and see how Seth dealt with the pressure of being an only child at AJL. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: Temples of Gold: UFO experts investigate whether the value, reverence and desire for gold is the result of extraterrestrial landings in the ancient past. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Inner Fear-ence: As the team conducts a new aerial experiment over the Triangle Area above Skinwalker Ranch, they find shocking new evidence. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: UFOs Caught On Camera: Host Tony Harris separates the real from the fake in some of the top UFOs caught on camera in recent history. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: World's Greatest Treasure Mysteries
programme.desc: Return to the Whydah: Matty and Tony re-join the excavation of the Whydah wreckage with Barry and his team in Cape Cod, near a graveyard of sunken cannons. (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Bang, Zoom, Pawn on the Moon!: The team check out an autographed Apollo 10 book, a set of Bob Hope's golf clubs and circus sideshow banners.

programme.desc: Vintage restorers Henry and Sam are back as they visit an emporium. (S1, ep 6)

programme.desc: Alien Power Plants: Giorgio Tsoukalos draws on evidence from past series as he asks whether aliens introduced the Greeks and Egyptians to electricity. (S1, ep 4)

programme.desc: Four Great Women and a Manicure: On a visit to the nail salon, Marge and Lisa discuss whether a woman can be simultaneously clever, powerful and beautiful. (S20 Ep20/21)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The First Pitch Insufficiency: Howard's nervous when NASA ask him to throw the first pitch at a baseball game. Sheldon claims his and Amy's relationship is the best in the gang. (S8 Ep3)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hook-Up Reverberation: Raj's honesty about his past comes back to haunt him when his girlfriend Emily gives Penny the cold shoulder. The guys consider an investment. (S8 Ep4)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Wiener Schnitzel and Underwear in a Tree: The new and final series commences! In the first episode, news of the tornado reaches Sheldon and Mary in Germany. (S7 Ep1)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Roulette Wheel and a Piano Playing Dog: Sheldon realises that he's the weakest student in his class, and Meemaw sets out to expand her gambling business. (S7 Ep2)

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: Brand new series: The events of last night's dinner party have left some friendships in tatters. Can they work it out? And one couple make a shocking return to the experiment. (S12 Ep25)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Panty Piata Polarization: Sheldon bans Penny from the flat for numerous minor infractions, so she retaliates. Howard and Raj search for the America's Next Top Model house. (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Lizard-Spock Expansion: Howard is furious when a woman who he likes falls for Leonard instead, despite Howard's efforts to woo her. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The White Asparagus Triangulation: Sheldon is delighted that Leonard has finally found a girlfriend who matches up to his high standards... Perhaps a little too delighted. (S2 Ep9/23)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Little Snip and Teaching Old Dogs: George Sr is worried Mary wants another baby, so he gets a secret vasectomy. Linkletter and Sturgis ask Sheldon for help. (S7 Ep11)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A New Home and a Traditional Texas Torture: George Sr gets an exciting job offer, and Sheldon prepares for his move to California. (S7 Ep12)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Bixby's Back: To avoid turning into that old boring couple, Phil and Claire decide to revisit their Clive and Juliana role-playing rendezvous from last Valentine's Day. (S2 Ep14)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Princess Party: The guest list for Lily's princess-themed birthday party gets a little out of hand when Mitchell decides to invite Mum, much to Claire's dismay. (S2 Ep15)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: El Viaje Misterioso de Nuestro Jomer (The Mysterious Voyage of Our Homer): Homer eats a dangerous chilli, has a hallucinogenic trip and meets a talking coyote (Johnny Cash). (S8 Ep9/25)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Springfield Files: Homer thinks he's seen an alien in the woods. This could be a case for Mulder and Scully (guest stars David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson). (S8 Ep10/25)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Monopolar Expedition: Leonard and Penny reconsider their feelings for each other, but then Leonard is offered the opportunity to spend the summer working at the North Pole. (S2 Ep23)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Electric Can Opener Fluctuation: Leonard's attempts to woo Penny are constantly thwarted. Sheldon heads to Texas after learning his friends meddled with his expedition data. (S3 Ep1)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Jiminy Conjecture: Leonard and Penny feel awkward around each other after their romantic liaison, while Sheldon and Howard take bets to determine a species of cricket. (S3 Ep2)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Large Marge: Marge accidentally gets breast implants after mistakenly thinking that Homer was flirting with two businesswomen while he was building houses for the homeless. (S14 Ep4/22)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Grace wants answers, and a shocking ultimatum forces someone to make an impossible choice. Meanwhile, a disastrous date leaves one resident seeking help in all the wrong places.

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight...
programme.desc: ...Australia: Brand new series: It's time for the partner swap, as the husbands and wives move in with new partners, but some are blindsided by hidden truths and blunt feedback. (S12 Ep26)

programme.title: Love Cheats: American Swindler
programme.desc: On the American Pacific coast, a female fraudster and leading local pagan feigns serious illness to steal over $500,000 from her victims. And then the FBI gets involved. (Ep3/4)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britain's sharpest armchair critics have been watching: Starstruck, The Home Edit, Made in Chelsea, SAS, This Is Going to Hurt, Dynasties II, and Pam & Tommy. (S19 Ep16)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Roll-neck-phobe Lucy returns, and this time men are off the menu. Can Dr Nick cure GP Emma's dating dry patch? And will James's love of 1D send Mark in the direction of the door? (S6 Ep2)

programme.desc: Sam Homewood, David May and Helen Evans travel to London to meet up with Cult United hero Dimitar Berbatov.

programme.desc: The former United keeper opens up about the risks he took to get his dream move to Old Trafford, and what it was like working alongside Edwin van der Sar.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Rooney
programme.desc: United and England's record goalscorer looks back on his incredible years at Old Trafford; the trophies, the training sessions, the dressing room pranks - this episode has it all!

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Odion Ighalo
programme.desc: The Nigerian striker shares his incredible journey to Old Trafford. Odion also revealed how he used to save up his dinner money to pay to watch United play at weekends.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Danny Webber
programme.desc: Danny talks about his experience coming through the Manchester United Academy and the demands that Eric Harrison and Sir Alex Ferguson put on him at a young age.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Russell Beardsmore
programme.desc: We hear about Russell's pranks which (bravely) were usually at the expense of Sir Alex Ferguson. Watch to the end to find out what happened when he aimed a snowball at the boss.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Gary Bailey
programme.desc: The former United keeper dialled in to the Pod all the way from Miami Beach. He told us how he struggled to settle in to the dressing room at times and how it sometimes ended up in a fight.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Raimond
programme.desc: The former United keeper looks back on his time at Old Trafford and reveals the highs and lows of working alongside Peter Schmeichel.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Ji-Sung Park
programme.desc: Ji reflected fondly on his special years at United and his close relationship with the fans, but he requested them to stop singing his chant, which has offensive connotations to the people of Korea.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Luke Chadwick
programme.desc: Chaddy told us the hilarious reason for once missing a training session and the attempt at covering it up, which landed him in a web of lies with Sir Alex.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Schweinsteiger
programme.desc: Deutscher Fussballmeister spoke glowingly of United's interim manager, Ralf Rangnick, and midfielder Scott McTominay, whose talent stood out to Schweinsteiger when he was training with Reserves.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Stam - Part 1
programme.desc: The Pod team joined Jaap in his hometown of Zwolle in The Netherlands for an extended look through his playing and managerial career, where he revealed how he initially turned down Sir Alex Ferguson.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Stam - Part 2
programme.desc: Jaap talks us through his controversial exit from Manchester United, and reveals that there was an opportunity for him to return to Old Trafford in the seasons that followed.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Kieran Richardson
programme.desc: Kieran dispelled a rumour about a training incident with Roy Keane and revealed why he couldn't wait to retire when he reached his early 30s.

programme.desc: The former France international looked back on a glittering career at Old Trafford, and picked out some of his highligths from working with both Sir Alex Ferguson and later, Arsene Wenger at Arsenal.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: John Aston Jr
programme.desc: The former United winger reflected on the iconic night at Wembley, where he picked up the Man of the Match Award alongside his winners' medal.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Owen Hargreaves
programme.desc: Owen looked back on his time working with Sir Alex Ferguson, what went through his head before taking a penalty in the 2008 Champions League Final shootout and the details of his career-ending injury.

programme.desc: SpongeBob becomes the richest Sponge in Bikini Bottom in 'Porous Pockets', and in 'Choir Boys', Squidward tries to avoid SpongeBob while on his way to an audition for the Bikini Bottom Men's Chorus.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: Open Season: Call of Nature

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Mom and Dad win a trip to a resort and decide to take the kids in 'Suite and Sour', then in 'Back in Black', when Lucy gets a crush on a regular normal boy, her sisters give her a makeover. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.desc: Domestic Robots: Grizzy discovers that the ranger's new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages, but the lemmings see the new gadget more as competition... (S1 Ep6)

programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Popcorn Party: The lemmings have invented a new popcorn game. When Grizzy notices that his she-bear seems to be drawn by the smell, he invites her over for a snack, just the two of them. (S1 Ep9)

programme.desc: Dancing with the Bears: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear he's in love with. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn darganfod holl gemau'r cae chwarae. Mae nhw hefyd yn chwarae mewn rhywbeth meddal, ond beth? Harmony, Melody & Bop discover all the different games you can play

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae Betsan yn froga anarferol iawn - nid yw'n gallu nofio. Tybed sut ddysgith hi? Betsan is a very unusual frog - she can't swim. So how is she ever going to learn?

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Rhaid i'r Pawenlu ddarganfod daint coll Aled cyn i Dylwythen y Dannedd gyrraedd! Aled loses his first tooth, then really loses it. The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan aiff Dan i chwilio am Pigog yn y Coed Gwyllt heb ei sbectol ma'r gwencod yn chwarae tric arno ac mae'n syrthio mewn i ffos efo Pigog. The weasels play a nasty trick on Mole.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd sawl ci bach ac Enfys a'i moch cwta.Today we meet some cute puppies and Enfys and her guinea pigs.

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
programme.desc: Mae 'na bry yn y den! Mae Fflwff yn ei ddilyn yn eiddgar a wneith dim byd yn ei rwystro - dodrefn, silffoedd uchel, neu hyd yn oed Brethyn! Fluff is in hot pursuit of a fly in the den!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Ma helynt yng Nghwmtwrch pan ma teclyn hirsgwar efo pwerau hudol yn disgyn o'r Pridd Uwchben. It's chaos in Cwmtwrch when a rectangular device with magic powers drops from the Earth Above.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Bela wrth ei bodd yn garddio ac yn falch tu hwnt o'i blodau lliwgar. Pan aiff rhai ar goll, mae'n gwybod pwy sydd ar fai - Anni! Bella's colourful flowers go missing - who's to blame?

programme.title: New: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Co' Bach yn llwyddo i feddu ar bwer y Jet-faneg. Ond, drwy lwc, nid o ddyfeisiadau y daw gwir bwer - ond o'r galon. Co' Bach manages to possess the power of the Jet-glove.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Rhyd y Grug sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Rhyd y Grug join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Pan fydd Pysgodyn Haul enfawr yn mynd yn sownd yn un o'r cychod Tanddwr, mae'n rhaid i Pegwn a Harri dynnu'r pysgodyn mawr allan o'r cwch. A huge Sunfish gets stuck in one of the Gups.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i ddweud helo wrth anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon cawn wybod mwy am yr Hyena a'r Mwnci Udo. This time we get to know the Hyena and the Howler monkey.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Weithiau mae'n hawdd tynnu sylw Pablo oddi ar beth mae o fod i'w wneud. Felly mae'n rhaid i'r anifeiliaid ei achub o Dir Tynnu Sylw. Pablo is easily distracted sometimes, like he is today!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Beth sy'n mynd i fyny?: Pan mae Barcud Mo yn mynd yn sownd ar ben t swyddfa, mae'r Tm yn gwybod sut i gadw eu traed ar y ddaear. Mo's kite gets stuck up on an office roof!

programme.title: Kim a Ct a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Ct ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and Ct on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw teithiwn i Indonesia, gwlad sydd wedi'i gwneud o filoedd o ynysoedd ar gyfandir Asia. We learn about the Indonesian language, the capital city of Jakarta and food like Nasi Goreng.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Mabli a'i ffrindiau yn chwilio am aderyn prin yn y goedwig! On today's adventure, Mai-Mai and her friends are on the lookout for a rare bird in the forest!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Mae Meleri a'r criw yn chwilio am micro-blastigau ar draeth Amroth ac ma criw o ddisgyblion Ysgol Penboyr wrthi'n garddio. Huw joins Nanw and Gwenno on their favourite Menai Strait walk.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae digon i'w wneud yn y Sw bob tro! Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn gweld llwyth o anifeiliaid ac yn dysgu am y rhai bach a mawr. Harmony, Melody and Bop learn more about zoo animals.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae Alun Asyn yn teimlo'n unig. Hoffai chwarae gyda'i ffrindiau newydd, ond does neb yn deall ei iaith "hi-ho". Is it possible to play together when everyone speaks a different language?

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Pan mae Maer Campus yn herio Porth yr Haul i gm bl-droed, mae'n rhaid i'r Pawenlu gamu i mewn. Mayor Campus challenges the Porth yr Haul team to a football match.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn falch iawn o'i hamog newydd ond yn gwrthod gadael i'w ffrindiau gael tro ynddo. Toad shows off his new hammock but refuses to let anyone else have a nap in it.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Deiniol y cocatw, ac Ifan a'i gi. Today we meet Deiniol the cockatoo, and Ifan and his dog.

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
programme.desc: Wedi'i ysbrydoli gan lun o gi yn mynd am dro, mae Brethyn yn penderfynu ceisio cerdded Fflwff! Inspired by a photo of a dog being walked, Tweedy is eager to try it out with Fluff!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Twm Twrch heddiw? What's happening in Twm Twrch's world today?

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Anni a Cai'n penderfynu chwarae cuddio. Ond mae Cai a Bochau'n methu dod o hyd i Anni, ydy hi'n creu annibendod yn rhywle? Anni and Cai decide to play hide and seek, but there's chaos!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Moc Samson yn galw i chwarae gemau fideo, ond mae'n rhaid i'r Jetlu fynd i'r afael Peredur Plagus. Moc calls over to play video games with Joni but the Jetlu have to deal with Peredur.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Pontybrenin sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Pontybrenin join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Sgwrs dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, bydd Elin Fflur yn sgwrsio gyda'r actor a'r cyflwynydd James Lusted. This time, Elin Fflur chats with actor and presenter James Lusted. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Heno ry' ni'n fyw o'r Gwobrau RTS a chawn sgwrs a chan gyda Lo-Fi Jones. We're live from the RTS Awards and we enjoy a chat and a song with Lo-Fi Jones.

programme.title: Ty Am Ddim
programme.desc: I Wrecsam awn ni heno i chwilio am dy i gael ei adnewyddu. Fydd na ddigon o elw i'r ddau brynu eu cartrefi eu hunain? We're heading to Wrexham tonight in search of a house to renovate.

programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Iaith ar Daith
programme.desc: Y cyn-chwaraewr rygbi, Josh Navidi, sy'n dysgu Cymraeg tro hwn efo help ei ffrind Ken Owens. Learning Welsh this time, with Ken Owens' help, is former international rugby player Josh Navidi.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Francois yn cael trafferth gwylanod. Pwy all ei achub? Y Pawenlu! Francois is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Sut mae Anni'n bwriadu cael gwared ar y bananas ych a fi mae Mam-Gu wedi roi yn ei bocs bwyd? How will Anni get rid of the yucky bananas that Mam-gu's put in her lunchbox?

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae pawb wrth eu bodd heddiw gan fod parti ar y traeth - pawb heblaw Lisa Ln. Everyone is excited to go to a beach party today, everyone except Lisa Ln.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Bronllwyn sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau llwigar! Teams from Ysgol Bronllwyn join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Y Doniolis
programme.desc: Mae sioe dalent Mici Afal wedi cyrraedd Cwm Doniol ac mae'r Doniolis yn benderfynol o ennill. Mici Afal brings his talent contest to Cwm Doniol and the Doniolis are determined to win.

programme.title: Larfa
programme.desc: Mae'r criw yn chwarae offerynnau ac yn profi henaint! The crew play instruments and experience old age!

programme.title: New: LEGO DREAMZzz
programme.desc: Mae Beth Bythoedd yn creu bwystfil dyblyg i drechu'r Cwsgarwyr unwaith ac am byth. Beth Bythoedd creates a doppel monster to eliminate the dream chasers once and for all.

programme.title: Mabinogiogi a Mwy
programme.desc: Fersiwn criw Stwnsh o hanes nawddsant Cymru, Dewi Sant, gyda digon o chwerthin, canu, dawnsio, rapio ac ambell i wyrth! The Stwnsh team's version of patron saint, Saint David's story.

programme.title: Y Tyrchwyr gyda Iolo Williams
programme.desc: Gyda'r tyllau yn llawn dop o rai bach, mae'n amser wynebu realiti bywyd tu allan. The burrows are overflowing with young. How do the animals cope with overcrowding and predation?

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae Gwenno'n teimlo'n ofnadwy. Pam fuodd hi mor wirion ag yfed gymaint a gweiddi'n gs ar Elen? Gwenno feels awful. Why was she so stupid as to shout at Elen?

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd
programme.desc: Cyfres goginio newydd gyda Colleen Ramsey. Tro hwn, mae hi'n dangos i ni sut all un ryseit blasus greu opsiynau eraill mewn wythnos brysur. A brand new cookery series with Colleen Ramsey.

programme.title: New: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Mae Meinir a Sioned yng Ngorslas gyda Adam Jones, sy'n ymuno thm cyflwyno'r gyfres eleni. New series: Visiting the Kew Gardens Orchid Festival & native daffodils at Conwy.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C

programme.title: New: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrddwn ag Osian Morris, Dolgellau, dyn ei filltir sgwar sy' wrth ei fodd yn yr awyr agored. We meet Osian, who's hobbies include traditional stone-walling, beekeeping & playing the banjo.

programme.title: Sgorio
programme.desc: Cyfres llawn cyffro pl-droed y pyramid Cymreig. Cymru Premier JD highlights: Newtown v Aberystwyth Town in the Bottom Six & Cardiff City v Briton Ferry closes the Adran Genero Premier.

programme.title: Gwesty Aduniad
programme.desc: Mae gan John Barnett rywbeth pwysig i'w ddweud wrth ei hen athrawon, ac mae Ian Thomas yn dod nol i gael newyddion am ei frawd neu chwaer. Shan is celebrating her retirement from the hotel.

programme.title: Y Sn
programme.desc: Ail gyfres Y Sn efo Francesca Sciarrillo a Joe Healy. Yn y bennod yma, dysgwn am baentio arwyddion gyda llaw, ac am sin gomedi'r Cymoedd. We visit an art residency on Bardsey Island.

programme.title: Y Pitws Bychain
programme.desc: Mae'n fore oer yn y ddl ac mae'r Pitws Bychain am wneud dillad cynnes efo help dafad gyfeillgar. It's a cold morning, and The Wee Littles decide that they should make some warmer clothes.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch a Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - bydd cysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae! Join Jam on a musical adventure full of interesting sounds and pictures!

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Yng nghanol prysurdeb y paratoi ar gyfer y Nadolig, mae'r Rheolwr Tew yn rhoi gwaith pwysig iawn i Henri. Henry loses a box when the Fat Controller sends him on a special Christmas mission.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pam fod awyr Ocido wedi troi mor goch? Gyda chymorth Sim, Sam a Swn mae'r ffrindiau'n mynd ar daith yn y roced i gael yr ateb. Why has the sky in Ocido turned so red? The friends find out...

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Mae Meleri a'r criw yn chwilio am micro-blastigau ar draeth Amroth ac ma criw o ddisgyblion Ysgol Penboyr wrthi'n garddio. Huw joins Nanw and Gwenno on their favourite Menai Strait walk.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cyfres animeddedig gyda chaneuon a hwiangerddi traddodiadol a chyfoes. Cn hwyliog yn cyflwyno gwahanol fwydydd yw Y Fasged Siopa. A jolly song which indroduces different sorts of foods!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Betsan yn mynd ar antur i Fferm Fach i weld sut mae moron yn cael eu tyfu gyda Hywel y ffermwr hud. Betsan goes on an adventure to Fferm Fach to learn more about how carrots are grown.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae'r dreigiau'n gyffrous gan fod Cadi yn mynd nhw i'r sinema, ond mae'r ffilm wedi mynd ar goll! All Bledd a Cef achub y dydd? The dragons are excited - Cadi is taking them to the cinema!

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae hi'n amser gwely, ond mae Deian a Loli'n cael lot gormod o hwyl yn chwarae triciau yn lle. It's bedtime, but Deian and Loli are having way too much fun playing tricks instead.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Bobl yn darganfod seren unig yn yr awyr, felly mae'r Olobos yn creu Awyryn i fynd nhw i fyny i'r gofod er mwyn chwarae gyda'r seren unig. New animated series for pre-schoolers.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Breian yn enwog drwy'r harbwr am ei frolio. Tybed am beth mae'n brolio heddiw? Breian is known throughout the harbour for his boasting abilities. What is he boasting about today?

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae nifer o greaduriaid yn byw yn y pwll cerrig, ac mae gan Seren rwyd i'w gweld yn well! Lots of creatures live in the rockpool, and Seren has a net so she can see them better!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sin, Sam, Sid a Mama Polenta'n sownd mewn coeden. Beth wnn nhw? Sin, Sam, Sid and Mama Polenta find themselves stuck up a tree. What to do?

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Youssef yn galw Harri i ddweud fod sinc wedi torri yn y Cwtsh Newydd, Rhydaman. Mae Harri'n gneud dipyn o lanast yno! Youssef calls Harri to say that a sink has broken in Cwtsh Newydd!

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Sam Tn a'i ffrindiau yn y pentre'. The adventures of Sam Tn and friends in the village.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Thema'r rhaglen hon yw 'Esgyrn'. A science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends, Sbarc the scientist and Nef the Nature Detective. The theme of this programme is 'Bones'.

programme.title: Oli Wyn
programme.desc: Heddiw, cawn weld sut mae trn ffwnicwlar Aberystwyth yn gweithio. Today we find out how the funicular train in Aberystwyth works.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Cochyn yn ceisio dal 'cneuen fr' tra bo Digbi yn dweud nad yw cnau mr yn bodoli. Cochyn is trying to catch a 'sea-nut' but Digbi says sea-nuts don't exist!

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: A fydd y criw o forladron bach o Ysgol Gwenllian yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi? Will the Ysgol Gwenllian pirates succeed in helping Ben Dant and Cadi defeat Capten Cnec?

programme.title: Y Pitws Bychain
programme.desc: Mae Lleia'n cael gwers bale, ac mae Mymryn yn ymuno am y tro cyntaf, dan arweiniad Cari Cryr a'i choesau hir. Bitsy is having her ballet lesson and Itsy joins for the first time.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - bydd cysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae. Join Jam on a musical adventure full of interesting sounds and pictures.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fydd Blero'n helpu Rheinallt i bobi mae pethau'n mynd o chwith wrth iddo gael y mesuriadau'n anghywir. A spot of baking with Rheinallt goes awry when Blero gets the quantities wrong!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn cyfeiriannu ym Mharc Craig y Nos, ac fe fydd Alys a'i ffrind Mila yn gwersylla. Today, Huw and Elan will be surfing in Caswell Bay.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Y tro hwn mae "Un a Dwy a Thair" yn gn sy'n ymarfer cyfri i ddeg. This time the song "Un a Dwy a Thair" helps practice counting to ten.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn tywys Betsan ar antur i Fferm Fach i ddod o hyd i arlleg fel bod hi'n gallu pobi bara garlleg. Hywel and Betsan seek garlic so that she can bake garlic bread.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae Storm Dewi wedi cyrraedd y dyffryn, ac mae Cadi'n cael galwad yn dweud fod coeden wedi cwympo. Storm Dewi has arrived, and Cadi gets a call saying that a tree has fallen on the tracks!

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Dyw Deian ddim yn deall pam fasa Loli eisiau treulio amser ar ei phen ei hun yn darllen yn lle chwara! Deian doesn't understand why Loli wants to spend time alone reading, and not playing.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, cawn weld sut mae Colleen yn rhoi bywyd newydd i hen ffefrynau. New cookery series with Colleen on food nostalgia. Today, Colleen celebrates old favourites with a new twist. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Cyfres yn edrych ar gartrefi Cymru drwy'r oesoedd. Yn y rhaglen hon, edrychwn ar dai o'r 1980au a'r 1990au. In this programme, we'll be focusing on houses from the 1980's and 1990's.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrddwn ag Osian Morris, Dolgellau, dyn ei filltir sgwar sy' wrth ei fodd yn yr awyr agored. We meet Osian, who's hobbies include traditional stone-walling, beekeeping & playing the banjo.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Y WAL
programme.desc: Yr olaf yn y gyfres, ac mae taith Ffion Dafis o waliau eiconig y byd yn gorffen gyda hanes cwymp Wal Berlin. Last in series, and Ffion Dafis's tour of iconic walls ends with the Berlin Wall.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Crensh wedi pwdu achos bod ei hesgidiau newydd yn frwnt, felly mae'r Olobobs yn creu dwli er mwyn codi ei chalon. Crunch is in a big grump because her new boots are dirty, poor thing.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Cai ar antur i Fferm Fach i weld o ble mae'r halen mae'n ei roi ar ei sglods yn dod. Cai goes on an adventure to Fferm Fach to see where the salt that he puts on his chips comes from.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Ai caws yw'r lleuad? Gall Odo a Dwdl fynd I'r lleuad a dod nol a darn I bawb yn y Gwersyll? Cawn weld. Odo figures out a way to go to the moon and bring a piece back for his friends.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Nimbwl yn rhy bryderus i fynd am ei fathodyn Clwb Cymylau cyntaf. Mae Blero a'i ffrindiau'n ceisio ei helpu gyda'i nerfusrwydd. Nimbwl is too nervous to do his first Cloud Club badge.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Ma'r efeillaid yn edrych ymlaen i fwyta crempog, ond ma 'na greadur bach arall sydd yn awyddus i fwyta eu brecwast, pry cop o'r enw Prys! A spider called Prys is after the twins' pancakes!

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: Boom!
programme.desc: Y tro yma, maen nhw'n edrych ar wyddoniaeth saethyddiaeth. This time, they build a catapult and experiment to see how to stop eggs from cracking when Aled drops them from a great height.

programme.title: Prys a'r Pryfed
programme.desc: Mae Lloyd yn clywed bod Berry'n symud i'w le ei hun ac mae Lloyd am osgoi edrych yn anaeddfed o'i gymharu. Lloyd hears that Berry is moving into his own place, and he wants to too!

programme.title: New: Mwy o Stwnsh Sadwrn
programme.desc: Cipolwg yn l dros rai o uchafbwyntiau rhaglen dydd Sadwrn. Tune in to relive some of the highlights of Saturday's programme.

programme.title: Ceffylau Cymru
programme.desc: Nia Marshalsay-Thomas sy'n ymweld 'r cynhyrchwyr ceffylau, Ron a Debbie Thomas, yn eu canolfan geffylau ger Llanddarog. A visit to Ron and Debbie Thomas at their equestrian centre.

programme.title: Sgorio
programme.desc: Cyfres llawn cyffro pl-droed y pyramid Cymreig. Cymru Premier JD highlights: Newtown v Aberystwyth Town in the Bottom Six & Cardiff City v Briton Ferry closes the Adran Genero Premier.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm
programme.desc: Mae Tom llawn nerfau pan mae'n mynd draw i'r ysbyty. Mae Kelly yn rhoi ei het busnes ymlaen ar gyfer ei diwrnod cyntaf yn Fflamingo's. Tom's full of nerves when he visits the hospital.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Diwrnod anodd i Lowri a Philip, wrth iddynt wynebu apwyntiad ysbyty a phrofion tyngedfennol. A difficult day for Lowri and Philip, with their hospital appointment and critical tests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Ysbyty: Dan Bwysau
programme.desc: Awn i Adran Argyfwng Maelor Wrecsam; cawn olwg onest ar be sy'n achosi eu problemau a sut ma'r ysbyty am ddatrys pethau. We take an unflinching look at Wrexham Maelor's Emergency department.

programme.title: Clwb Rygbi
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau o'r rownd ddiweddaraf o Super Rygbi Cymru a hefyd Farsiti Cymru. Highlights from the latest round of Super Rugby Wales and also Varsity Wales. EC available.

programme.title: Iaith ar Daith
programme.desc: Y cyn-chwaraewr rygbi, Josh Navidi, sy'n dysgu Cymraeg tro hwn efo help ei ffrind Ken Owens. Learning Welsh this time, with Ken Owens' help, is former international rugby player Josh Navidi.

programme.title: Every Day's A Holiday
programme.desc: 1964. Musical starring John Leyton, Mike Sarne, Freddie & the Dreamers, Ron Moody, Liz Fraser, Nicholas Parsons and Danny La Rue. A group of high-spirited teens find friendship, love & music. [S]

programme.title: It Happened In Soho
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Director: Frank Chisnell. Stars Richard Murdoch, Patricia Raine & Henry Oscar. Murder drama set in Soho involving a police inspector, a newspaper reporter and a country girl. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: Get up and dance for some 60s rock and roll with That Old Yeah Yeah Feeling by Shane Fenton and The Fentones.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: No Love Wasted. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Lon Chaney Jr. & Marian Seldes. A gruff widower who has been corresponding with a lonely woman runs into trouble when the time comes to meet her. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Teenage Terror. 1963. Stars David Kossoff, Peggy Mount & Hugh Walters. The Major is behind on rent, he must pay or be kicked out. Meanwhile, Alf's teenage tearaway nephew comes to stay. [S]

programme.title: Minesweeper
programme.desc: 1943. War drama starring Richard Arlen, Jean Parker & Russell Hayden. A former naval deserter is drawn back to the services after the attack on Pearl Harbour. [S]

programme.title: The Crooked Sky
programme.desc: 1957. Crime drama directed by Henry Cass. An American detective & Scotland Yard must work together to crack a counterfeit gang. Stars Wayne Morris, Karin Booth and Anton Diffring. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Ice Age
programme.desc: 1961. An expansive look at ice, not only in the home, but also at the various sports on ice.

programme.title: The Black Rider
programme.desc: 1954. Directed by Wolf Rilla and starring Jimmy Hanley, Rona Anderson and Lionel Jeffries. A local reporter discovers a group of enemy agents, but will the story get him promotion? [S]

programme.title: Never Look Back
programme.desc: 1952. Drama. Director: Francis Searle. Stars Rosamund John, Hugh Sinclair, Guy Middleton. A female lawyer puts her reputation on the line to defend her ex-boyfriend who has been accused of murder. [S]

programme.title: The Broken Horseshoe
programme.desc: 1953. Crime drama. A hit and run victim is operated on by Dr. Fenton (Robert Beatty), the victim is later murdered and the doctor is involved. Starring Elizabeth Sellars. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed in the second half of April. [S]

programme.title: A Matter of Murder
programme.desc: 1949. Crime. Directed by John Gilling. Stars Maureen Riscoe, John Barry & John Le Mesurier. A bank clerk becomes the target of a killer and a detective after embezzling money for his girlfriend. [S]

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: 1951. Western. Directed by Richard Thorpe. Stars Burt Lancaster, Joanne Dru & Robert Walker. The sons of a cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, fight for their father's empire. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Turkey Day. 1963. Stars Donna Douglas, Irene Ryan & Benny Rubin. Plans for a holiday feast at the Clampett mansion go awry when Elly bonds with the Thanksgiving turkey. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1954. The Silent Witness. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Stars Molly Weir, Ivan Craig & Kenneth Henry. The case of the self-confessed killer who almost escaped the full weight of the law. (S1, E09)

programme.title: Dixon of Dock Green
programme.desc: Conspiracy. 1975. Stars Jack Warner, Andrew Burt, Pat Ashton & Jon Laurimore. Dixon and Crawford face a dilemma when they find a PC liaising with a suspected criminal. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Fly Casting/The Log Splitter. 1986. Jack Hargreaves illustrates the technical advances in fly fishing. He then shows us his latest gadget for chopping logs for his wood burning stove. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: We have a short film of Peter Sellers featuring Graham Stark, Dick Emery & Raymond Francis! Then it's off to 1969 for 'new' scientific discoveries. And do you remember Archie Andrews ice lollies? [S]

programme.title: Public Eye
programme.desc: Many a Slip. 1972. Mystery Drama. Stars Alfred Burke, Ray Smith & Michael Culver. A routine credit inquiry leads Marker to uncover some strange discoveries concerning an eminent doctor's wife. [S]

programme.title: Dead Gorgeous
programme.desc: 2002. Drama/Comedy. Directed by Sarah Harding. Stars Fay Ripley, Helen McCrory & Ron Cook. In post-war London, a chance meeting between two old friends sets off a murderous chain of events. [S]

programme.title: Hi, Mom!
programme.desc: 1970. Comedy. Director: Brian De Palma. Stars Robert De Niro & Allen Garfield. A Vietnam veteran returns to New York and begins filmmaking, but he soon falls in with a group of radical activists.

programme.title: The Death of Adolf Hitler
programme.desc: 1973. Drama. Directed by Rex Firkin. Stars Frank Finlay, Caroline Mortimer & Oscar Quitak. The story of the last ten days of Hitler's life as his dream of a thousand year Reich became a nightmare. [S]

programme.title: The Death of Adolf Hitler
programme.desc: 1973. Drama. Directed by Rex Firkin. Stars Frank Finlay, Caroline Mortimer & Oscar Quitak. The story of the last ten days of Hitler's life as his dream of a thousand year Reich became a nightmare. [S]

programme.title: The Great Flamarion
programme.desc: 1945. Drama. Directed by Anthony Mann. Stars Erich von Stroheim, Mary Beth Hughes & Dan Duryea. A beautiful female performer manipulates all the men in her life in order to achieve her ambitions. [S]

programme.title: Beyond The Truth
programme.desc: The Lost Ark. The Search For The 'Lost Ark' - An insightful documentary searching for the resting place of The Lost Ark Of The Covenant containing exclusive interviews and footage. (S1, E01)

programme.title: Dangerous Assignment
programme.desc: The Havana Microfilm Story. 1952. Stars Brian Donlevy, Jeanne Tatum & Howard Joslin. Steve navigates the dangerous back alleys of Havana in search of a spy in possession of stolen documents. [S]

programme.title: Profile
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Director Francis Searle and starring John Bentley, Kathleen Byron and Thea Gregory. The editor of a magazine is keen on the boss's daughter but her mother is keen on him. [S]

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: 1962. Drama directed by Francis Searle and starring Dermot Walsh. When a young girl is knocked down there are only three donors of the same blood group. A frantic search to find the donors begins. [S]

programme.title: The Traitor
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Directed by Michael McCarthy. Stars Anton Diffring & Christopher Lee. Survivors of a WW2 resistance group meet at a country house to find out which of them had betrayed their leader. [S]

programme.title: The Narrowing Circle
programme.desc: 1955. Crime. Directed by Charles Saunders and starring Paul Carpenter and Hazel Court. A magazine crime writer is passed over for promotion by a rival who also steals the girl, but is murdered. [S]

programme.title: Hour of Decision
programme.desc: 1957. Crime. Stars Lionel Jeffries & Hazel Court. Reporter Joe (Jeff Morrow) finds his wife is the prime suspect in a murder investigation. [S]

programme.title: Burnt Evidence
programme.desc: 1954. Drama starring Jane Hylton, Duncan Lamont and Donald Gray. Lamont plays the jealous husband of Hylton. When confronting her lover, he accidentally shoots the man and runs for the hills. [S]

programme.title: A Case for PC 49
programme.desc: 1951. Mystery. Directed by Francis Searle. Stars Brian Reece, Joy Shelton & Christine Norden. PC 49 teams up with his girlfriend to solve a crime after a murder is committed right under his nose. [S]

programme.title: Three Crooked Men
programme.desc: 1959. Crime. Director: Ernest Morris. Stars Gordon Jackson, Sarah Lawson, Warren Mitchell. A shopkeeper is taken hostage when 3 crooks break into his shop to drill through to the bank next door. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: The Shareout. 1961. Directed by Gerard Glaister. Stars Bernard Lee, Alexander Knox & William Russell. Mike Stafford helps Scotland Yard solve a case that has already caused three deaths. [S]

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: The New Invisible Man. 1956. Stars Boris Karloff, Ewan Roberts . Colonel March receives a queer complaint that a pair of disembodied gloves killed a man. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Cat and the Fiddle. 1966. Stars Adam West, Julie Newmar & Jack Kelly. Batman and Robin discover Catwoman is now masquerading as rich old Minerva Matthews and must stop her next scheme. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Death Ride. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Patrick Barr & Humphrey Heathcote. A man is suspected of murdering his wife; Maguire starts investigating, which motivates someone to try to run him over. [S]

programme.title: Rumpole of the Bailey
programme.desc: Rumpole and the Reform of Joby Jonson. Stars: Leo McKern, Marion Mathie, Patricia Hodge. Rumpole defends a juvenile delinquent on charges of assaulting an elderly woman.

programme.title: Love for Lydia
programme.desc: Episode 10. 1977. Stars Mel Martin, Christopher Blake & Peter Davison. Lydia and Tom are now deeply involved but conflict arises. Meanwhile, Richardson makes plans to move to London. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Join Caroline Munro for an evening of dark tales from the 70s. First up, we become trapped in the 1973 British anthology film The Vault of Horror directed by Roy Ward Baker. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
